sources.name: TripData1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  TripData1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared TripData1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://testdatalakerandiv.dfs.core.windows.net/sample-data/trip_data_1.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = TripData1,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"tip_amount", type number}}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Changed column type", {"passenger_count"}, {{"average_tip_amount", each List.Average([tip_amount]), type nullable number}})
in
  #"Grouped rows";
